//The Warper to Mall

poring_w02,103,101,4	script	Mall NPC	951,{
warp "mall01" ,99,76;
end;

OnInit:
	   waitingroom "ITEM MALL",0;
end;
}

prontera,151,187,4	duplicate(Mall NPC)	Mall NPC#PRONT	951
moc_para01,37,18,4	duplicate(Mall NPC)	Mall NPC#edenz	951
aldebaran,143,124,4	duplicate(Mall NPC)	Mall NPC#Alde	951
izlude,121,144,4	duplicate(Mall NPC)	Mall NPC#Izludez	951

//The Exit to Prontera
mall01,95,92,4	script	EXIT	738,{
mes "Are you sure you want to exit?";
switch(select("Yes:Cancel")) {
	case 1:
		warp "poring_w02" ,99,75;
		end;
	default:
		close;
}

OnInit:
	   waitingroom "EXIT",0;
end;
}

// Gold Farm

		end;
	default:
		close;

//== Kafra ================================================
mall01,99,90,4	script	Kafra Employee::Kaf_mall01	4_F_KAFRA6,{
	cutin "kafra_06",2;
	callfunc "F_KafSet";
	mes "[Kafra Employee]";
	mes "Welcome to the";
	mes "Kafra Corporation~";
	mes "The Kafra Services are";
	mes "always here to support";
	mes "you. So how can I be";
	mes "of service today?";
	callfunc "F_Kafra",5,0,0,40,800;
	savepoint "mall01",100,76;
	callfunc "F_KafEnd",0,1,"in Mayaan Mall!";
}
